justdo_chat_default_welcome_msg: Hello and welcome to JustDo! This is your personal support channel. If you require any assistance, please leave us a message. We will get in touch with you as soon as we can. Have a nice day!
bot_log_message_group_admin_appointed: __performed_by__ promoted __admins__ as admins of this channel.
bot_log_message_group_admin_removed: __performed_by__ demoted __admins__ as admins of this channel.
